name: Zombie Trigger
description: is a VR first person shooting game, it supports both Oculus and HTC Vive. In the game you will play as an agent in a Japanese Temple to escape the siege of zombies. The game provide 10 levels，2 different game modes，2 challenging bosse. What is worth mentioning is you can use your helmet to dodge some special attack.
minimum_requirements: OS: win7 Processor: i5 3450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GTX650 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: no limit
recommended_requirements: OS: win7 Processor: i5 6500 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GTX960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: no limit
